1: @@//mi <mistake>'dor//sems</mistake> can grol nas chags <mistake>then</mistake> <mistake>po//'gyur</mistake> ba'i chags pa sel bar <mistake>byed// 'di</mistake> rnams <mistake>rnams</mistake> <mistake>drug</mistake> du <mistake>mrjodu //mi</mistake> <mistake>'gyun</mistake> ye shes tshor ba <mistake>dang//rnam</mistake> shes
2: gzugs dang 'du byed <mistake>dang //'du</mistake> shes de rnams phung <mistake>po'i</mistake> <mistake>rirs//ya</mistake> shes me <mistake>dng</mistake> nam mkha' <mistake>s/rlung</mistake> chu rnams kyi rim pa <mistake>bzhin//mini</mistake> <mistake>mi gi</mistake> rna ba lus <mistake>da</mistake> <mistake>ngsna// ltse</mistake> rnams kyi yang de bzhin <mistake>nyid/</mistake>
3: sgra ro chos kyi dbyings dang <mistake>dri//reg</mistake> bya kha dog rnams kyi <mistake>yang//kho</mistake> <mistake>bo'i</mistake> rgyal po gdong drug <mistake>'jigs//ri gis</mistake> drug rnams kyis yongs dag <mistake>pa//lus</mistake> dang gsang ba dbang po <mistake>sems//rtag</mistake> <mistake>tu</mistake> <mistake>dkyim</mistake>
4: 'khor rnam pa <mistake>gsum//shes</mistake> rab thabs kyi rdo rje <mistake>gsum//rdo</mistake> rje sems dpa' nyid du <mistake>'gyur// 'di</mistake> ni <mistake>di bang</mistake> gi sgrub thabs <mistake>te//mchog</mistake> tu <mistake>ma</mistake> 'gyur sgrub pa'i <mistake>thabs//rtsa</mistake> dang rigs dang yang dag
5: ldan // zla ba mdor <mistake>bstan</mistake> pa <mistake>yis</mistake> <mistake>bshad//ces</mistake> pa 'jig <mistake>ten</mistake> khams kyi le'ur le'ur lnga pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur <mistake>ba'i/ dbar gi</mistake> <mistake>sgrub</mistake> thabs mdor bstan pa rdzogs <mistake>so////'di</mistake> ni kha
6: <mistake>rche'i</mistake> <mistake>pau+ri</mistake> ta <mistake>so</mistake> ma <mistake>na tha</mistake> <mistake>dang/bod</mistake> kyi lo <mistake>rtsa ba</mistake> <mistake>'bhro</mistake> dge slong shes rab grags pas bsgyur zhing zhus <mistake>te</mistake> gtan la phab pa <mistake>las /slar</mistake> yang sgra <mistake>tshad</mistake> pa rin chen rgyal <mistake>mtsha / gyis/dpalnA</mistake> <mistake>ro</mistake> ba'i
7: 'grel bshad dang mthun par bsgyur zhing zhus te dag par <mistake>byas</mistake> <mistake>pa'o//////dus</mistake> <mistake>lhoro</mistake> <mistake>bsltas rtsud</mistake> <mistake>bshug///rgya</mistake> gar skad <mistake>du/ bar</mistake> ma <mistake>aA</mistake> di <mistake>bu +ha</mistake> <mistake>u</mistake> <mistake>+AM ta</mistake> <mistake>'</mistake> <mistake>shri</mistake> <mistake>ka'</mistake> <mistake>la tskra</mistake> <mistake>n'</mistake> ma <mistake>ta+wa</mistake> <mistake>r'dzA/</mistake>
8: bod skad <mistake>du/ mchog</mistake> gi <mistake>ding</mistake> <mistake>po'i</mistake> <mistake>sengs</mistake> rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya <mistake>b/ dpal</mistake> dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal <mistake>lo//thams</mistake> cad mkhyen pa ye shes sku
